Bhargavi Perumalla

Summary:	
Ø A	competent	professional	with	5+	years	of	IT	Experience	in	HP/Open	Text	Exstream	v9,	v16,	V20.	
Ø Hands	on	experience	on	Forms	designing,	development	and	Validation.	
Ø Good	knowledge	on	Insurance	domain.	
Ø Familiar	 with	 aspects	 of	software	 development	 life	 cycle	 like	 requirement	 capturing,	 analysis,	 design,	
development,	product	support,	maintenance	and	Testing.	
Ø Experience	in	working	as	part	of	Print	&	Forms	Team	by	developing	static,	variable	and	complex	forms	real-time	
by	using	Open	Text	Exstream	v16	and	V20.		
Ø Experience	in	different	Data	files	creations,	their	File	formats	(xml	files,	Json)	and	their	Mapping.		
Ø Worked	with	tables-based	sections.		
Ø Experience	in	Rules,	Variables,	components,	Design	Templates,	ADA,	Data	sections.	
Ø Experience	in	Cloud	Computing	platform.	
Ø Worked	on	form	designing	in	Ad-hoc,	variable	forms	by	using	BIRT	tool.

Ø Experience	in	Cloud	Computing	platform.	
Ø Worked	on	form	designing	in	Ad-hoc,	variable	forms	by	using	BIRT	tool.		
Ø Aware	of	PDF	pass	through	concept	and	ADA.		
Ø Ability	to	assume	responsibility	and	work	independently	and	as	a	pro-active	team	member.		
Ø Strong	problem	analysis	and	solving	skills.		
Ø Creating	documentation	for	handover	and	deployment.		
Ø Constantly	working	towards	process	improvement	and	refinement.		
Ø A	Highly	Motivated	Team	Player	with	excellent	communication,	negotiation	and	relationship	building	skills.	
Ø Experience	in	working	Agile	Methodology	and	Jira	Tool.		
Ø Ensuring	smooth	transition	of	projects	to	increase	customer	satisfaction.
